com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.adapter
Interface IExternalDataAdapter

public interface IExternalDataAdapter

A set of methods that each retrieve data from an external data source, and transform that data to XML that conforms to an Intelligence Analysis Platform schema.

Since:
4.0

Method Summary
 Source dumbbellSearch(SearchNode fromEntity, SearchNode link, SearchNode toEntity)
          Searches the external data source for dumbbells meeting a range of criteria, and returns a Source containing the results.

          Finds information in the external data source that is related to specified data that was already retrieved.

          Searches the external data source for information that contains a specified term.

          Searches the external data source for information that meets the assembled criteria in the specified NetworkSearchNodeList, and returns a Source that contains the results.
 Source search(String searchString, SetInfo setInfo, ItemTypeIdList itemTypeIds, FilterInfoList filterInfos)
          Searches the external data source for information that meets a range of criteria, and returns a Source that contains the results.
 

Method Detail

dumbbellSearch

Source dumbbellSearch(SearchNode fromEntity,
                      SearchNode link,
                      SearchNode toEntity)
Searches the external data source for dumbbells meeting a range of criteria, and returns a Source containing the results.

Parameters:
fromEntity - A SearchNode that contains criteria to match the "from" Entity in a dumbbell against.
link - A SearchNode that contains criteria to match the Link in a dumbbell against.
toEntity - A SearchNode that contains criteria to match the "to" Entity in a dumbbell against.
Returns:
See above.

expand

Source expand(List<String> seedItemKeys,
              List<String> throughLinkTypes,
              List<String> toEntityTypes,
              int maxNumberOfLinks,
              boolean shouldThrowIfTooManyLinks)
Finds information in the external data source that is related to specified data that was already retrieved.

Parameters:
seedItemKeys - Strings containing the identifiers of Items to which retrieved data must be related.
throughLinkTypes - Strings containing the identifiers of the LinkTypes that retrieved Links can have. If this parameter is null or empty, then the operation is not constrained by LinkType.
toEntityTypes - Strings containing the identifiers of the EntityTypes that Entitys at the other end of retrieved Links can have. If this parameter is null or empty, then the operation is not constrained by EntityType.
maxNumberOfLinks - The maximum number of Links to be returned.
shouldThrowIfTooManyLinks - true to throw an exception (and return no results) when the number of Links connected to the identified Entitys exceeds maxNumberOfLinks; false to throw no exception and return up to maxNumberOfLinks results. If maxNumberOfLinks is not exceeded, this parameter has no effect.
Returns:
A Source containing XML data for the specified Items and the Links and Entitys to which they are related in the external data source.

fullTextSearch

Source fullTextSearch(String searchString)
Searches the external data source for information that contains a specified term.

Parameters:
searchString - A String containing the term to search for.
Returns:
A Source containing XML data for Items whose contents match the search term.

networkSearch

Source networkSearch(NetworkSearchNodeList networkSearchCriteria)
Searches the external data source for information that meets the assembled criteria in the specified NetworkSearchNodeList, and returns a Source that contains the results.

Parameters:
networkSearchCriteria - The NetworkSearchNodeList containing the network structure and search criteria.
Returns:
See above.

search

Source search(String searchString,
              SetInfo setInfo,
              ItemTypeIdList itemTypeIds,
              FilterInfoList filterInfos)
Searches the external data source for information that meets a range of criteria, and returns a Source that contains the results.

Parameters:
searchString - A String that contains a term to search for, or null to avoid constraining the operation in this way.
setInfo - A SetInfo that specifies the owner of a set to search within, or null if the operation should not be restricted in this way.
itemTypeIds - An ItemTypeIdList that contains identifiers for the ItemTypes that matching Items must have, or null to match all Items.
filterInfos - A FilterInfoList that contains the FilterInfos that define Property and metadata values that matching Items must have, or null to match all Items.
Returns:
See above.
